languages.text: {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается.{/n} "Разумеется. Леди Теодора была бы чрезвычайно расстроена, потеряй она одного из своих драгоценных наследников... но это уже неважно."

traits.locale_text: {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается.{/n} "Разумеется. Леди Теодора была бы чрезвычайно расстроена, потеряй она одного из своих драгоценных наследников... но это уже неважно."

languages.text: {n}He smiles faintly.{/n} "Certainly. Lady Theodora would be devastated if she were to lose one of her precious heirs... but that is no longer relevant."
languages.original_text: {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается.{/n} "Разумеется. Леди Теодора была бы чрезвычайно расстроена, потеряй она одного из своих драгоценных наследников... но это уже неважно."

{n}He smiles faintly.{/n} "Certainly. Lady Theodora would be devastated if she were to lose one of her precious heirs... but that is no longer relevant."

languages.text: {n}他淡淡地笑了笑。{/n}“没问题。如果西奥多拉夫人失去了她宝贵的候选继承人，她恐怕会很伤心……不过，这件事情已经不重要了。”
languages.original_text: {n}He smiles faintly.{/n} "Certainly. Lady Theodora would be devastated if she were to lose one of her precious heirs... but that is no longer relevant."

traits.locale_text: {n}他淡淡地笑了笑。{/n}“没问题。如果西奥多拉夫人失去了她宝贵的候选继承人，她恐怕会很伤心……不过，这件事情已经不重要了。”

languages.text: {n}Esboza una sonrisa débil.{/n} «Ciertamente. Lady Theodora se sentiría devastada si perdiera a un{mf|o|a} de sus valiosos herederos... aunque eso ya no importa».
languages.original_text: {n}He smiles faintly.{/n} "Certainly. Lady Theodora would be devastated if she were to lose one of her precious heirs... but that is no longer relevant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Esboza una sonrisa débil.{/n} «Ciertamente. Lady Theodora se sentiría devastada si perdiera a un{mf|o|a} de sus valiosos herederos... aunque eso ya no importa».

languages.text: {n}彼はかすかに微笑んだ。{/n}「確かに。大切な後継者の一人を失ったらシオドーラ様は打ちのめされるでしょうが…もうそんなことは関係ありません」
languages.original_text: {n}He smiles faintly.{/n} "Certainly. Lady Theodora would be devastated if she were to lose one of her precious heirs... but that is no longer relevant."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はかすかに微笑んだ。{/n}「確かに。大切な後継者の一人を失ったらレディ・テオドラは打ちのめされるだろうが…もうそんなことは関係ない」
{n}彼はかすかに微笑んだ。{/n}「確かに。大切な後継者の一人を失ったらシオドーラ様は打ちのめされるでしょうが…もうそんなことは関係ありません」

languages.text: {n}Il sourit légèrement.{/n} « Certainement. Dame Théodora serait anéantie si elle venait à perdre {mf|un précieux héritier|une précieuse héritière}... mais cela n'a plus aucune importance. »
languages.original_text: {n}He smiles faintly.{/n} "Certainly. Lady Theodora would be devastated if she were to lose one of her precious heirs... but that is no longer relevant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il sourit légèrement.{/n} « Certainement. Dame Théodora serait anéantie si elle venait à perdre {mf|un précieux héritier|une précieuse héritière}... mais cela n'a plus aucune importance. »

languages.text: {n}Er lächelt schwach.{/n} "Natürlich. Lady Theodora wäre todunglücklich, wenn sie einen ihrer wertvollen Erben verlöre ... aber das spielt jetzt keine Rolle mehr."
languages.original_text: {n}He smiles faintly.{/n} "Certainly. Lady Theodora would be devastated if she were to lose one of her precious heirs... but that is no longer relevant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er lächelt schwach.{/n} "Natürlich. Lady Theodora wäre todunglücklich, wenn sie einen ihrer wertvollen Erben verlöre ... aber das spielt jetzt keine Rolle mehr."

languages.text: {n}Yüzünde hafif bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Elbette. Leydi Theodora, kıymetli vârislerinden birini kaybedecek olursa yıkılır... Lakin bunun artık bir ehemmiyeti yok."
languages.original_text: {n}He smiles faintly.{/n} "Certainly. Lady Theodora would be devastated if she were to lose one of her precious heirs... but that is no longer relevant."
